entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as weakened and vulnerable.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person mentioned in the text, known for her quote about wands and wizards.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A person who has a pouch around Dumbledore's neck.

entities.name: twin cores of dumbledore's wand
entities.description: A part of Dumbledore's wand that has been lost.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: An old Snitch that Harry's hand brushes against.

relationships.description: Dumbledore has lost the protection of his wand.
